In this year 2400 elementary school pupils in Bremen got 1 hour per week as chess lesson Bremen is the leading city of school chess in Germany.
72% of teachers said the pupils are happy and enjoy to play 1 hour of chess per week.
23% said that the kids also play in their free time.
